name: Alpaca Man
description:
Fight with your spit!

Alpaca Man is a roguelike platformer featuring an alpaca in need of your guidance through a procedural death labyrinth.

Your attack differs depending where your facing so plan your actions carefully.

Controls

Z-jump

X-attack

Arrow keys-move

Game Modes

Rogue-Has a final boss to defeat at the end of a set of levels

Super-An interesting twist on the game play that randomizes your attacks

Endless-a score attack mode that just gets harder level by level

Features

Controller support

Original soundtrack

Shoot spit

4 game modes

1:1 aspect ratio

15 fps

v1.2 changes:

Added more animations, game modes, a final boss and music
